reviews.review:
Pros:
~Portal physics is great to experiment with
~Quirky challenges and puzzles
~Game feels effortless (in a good way)

Cons:
~Short game

Overall: Worth grabbing on a sale.
One of the best games of all time
Second best game out there. Period.

Gameplay is pretty fun. It is unique but the one gripe is that GLADOS is not that funny. Portal 2 is much funnier. GLADOS is actually funny in that game as well. I would not buy at full price but if you wait for a steam sale and care mainly about the gameplay I would reccommed. Buy it bundled with portal 2.

Primo gioco aquistato da Steam, anche se c'è gia un sequel, posso dire che questo gioco è bellissimo.
E' un rompicapo un cui bisogna usare la testa per vincere, non c'è nessuna sparatoria, già per dire.
E' forse uno degli unici giochi FPS in cui, come ho gia detto, richiede strategia, e testa naturalmente.

Pro :

- Gioco con grafica Fluida, nessun problema.
- Longevo, può durare fino a 10 Ore.
- Unico FPS con l'assenza di Sparatoria, bisogna usare Strategia.
- Molto divertente..
_____________________________________________________

Contro :

- ...Anche se certe volte noioso.
- Potrebbe risultare ripetitivo.


Beh, niente di che, la trama di questa storia è orribili, tutto questo per una torta, bah.
Il gioco lo consiglio, anche se vi ci sono certi problemi, anche fastidiosi.
it is very fun but you have to think about some level's this game is good if your parents don't like shoot them up's/fighting games this is just a fun for the hole faimly type of game....

16/20

Grand respect pour ce jeu. La physique et ce gameplay sont tout à fait impressionnant.
On peut produire deux portails interdimensionnels relié ensemble. vous entrez dans un portails, vous sortez de l'autre.
Ce Puzzle Plate-Forme FPS ravivera le coeur des preneurs de tête et petit amateur de case tête.
Graphisme: réalisme et jeu de lumiere bluffant
Gameplay: même si l'on peut jouer avec la manette, je vous conseille la souris. (les reflexes et mouvements vifs sont importants)
Scénario: STUPEFIANT! woah quoi, l'histoire est cool (et est encore mieux dans le 2!!)
Musique: Electro, bien foutu et adaptative à vos actions dans les salles.

Un incontournable de Steam.

Best puzzle game i've played so far!!

Song after beating the game <3
Un juegazo, nada mas que decir ....
Uma mecânica incrível, fases divertidas e personagens mesmo que "pouco" citados,  cativantes. Isso é do que se trata Portal um jogo divertido, bonito(pelo menos na epoca que lançou) e interessante.
Una patata intentó quemarme vivo. 10/10
Good Game Loved this seiers better than half life to be honest
best puzzle game i ever played
Great Puzzle game. Probably the best.
i have played this game through and i love it weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
Para mi que he podido probarlo hace poco pese a los años que tiene ya, un juego que no tiene nada que envidiar a grades nombres de hoy día. THE CAKE IS A LIE

Time: 8/10
Reapetitive game play: 7/10

Miam ^^

I picked this game up when it was on-sale for $2.49. I had heard a lot of good things about it and I love thinking games, so I swooped in and got what was supposed to be one of the all-time greats.

It was short and it was just barely more interesting than doing a Sudoku Puzzle at McDonald's in the morning. It had its good moments, but all in all it was nowhere near what I expected it to be after hearing so much good about it. I hear the sequel is much better, but this game was so "meh" I dunno if I'm at all interested in picking it up. It wasn't terrible like some games, but all in all, it's just creative puzzles placed in a dull enviroment with an extremely short gameplay time. If you're interested in this game, wait until it is on sale.
Отличная игра. Отличный драйв. Смешные персонажи.

[h1]After a long time, I have decided to play this game again. [/h1]

The atmosphere of this product, although still awesome. No doubt, that some mastered details layin' inside of this. 
First of all, there are many-many "imagine it with your own fantasy" moments, for instance in places, where somebodies (probably a human beings) were before. There is no exact point in the storyline. There are basic & often complex tasks that we need to perform. In meanwhile our mission is to break out from this horrible "experiment prison". 
So in words, I just can say positive things about of this game. It isn't just opening and jumping through portals. 
It is about the experience what no other game(s) could provide in this very unique genre.
The only negative point is, that the whole thing is pretty short (took approx. ~2 hours to finish).
So this game will never get outaged. Still one of the bests. I love it. Long live Portal!

Pros:
[list]
    [*]The atmosphere is unique
    [*]We love Aperture Science, GlaDOS & the Portal Gun
    [*]Inspiring soundtracks, puzzles & tasks.
[/list]
Negatives:
[list]
    [*]Not so long gameplay
    [*]I might pick this game @ a year once (gets boring after re-plays)
[/list]

A brilliant puzzle game with a subtle side story and dark humour.  Highly recommended to play at least once for all ages and experiences of gamer.

Do yourself a favor: buy this game. Play it. Do not look up how to get through the puzzles unless you're really stuck: it's way more satisfying to figure it out yourself. Beat the game. Buy the sequel, rinse and repeat.
Portal really is a good puzzle game with a huge sarcastic and dark atmosphere from the first to the last second!

Ce jeu est une pure tuerie, un chef-d'oeuvre, même s'il est particulièrement court, ce jeu est magnifique.

Même avec le temps, les graphismes ne viellissent pas, l'histoire est parfaite, et le gameplay est FANTASTIQUE.

Je recommande fortement ce jeu, je ne m'en lasse pas

Lo Positivo:

- Para empezar es un juego que requiere de tus capacidades cognitivas basadas en la resolución de problemas, memoria, hipótesis y habilidades espaciales (Definitivamente mejorarán al terminar el juego).
- Buena historia como profunda y se complementa a la saga de half life.
- Muy buena música.
- Buenos Gráficos.

Lo Negativo:

- La duración de la campaña. (Pero si te sacas los logros y todo al 100% puedes llegar a las 10 horas)

Шедевр и только...PORTAL игра с очень интересной задумкой в плане перемешения( что то как то высоко до того места,это не проблема, туда синий портал сюда карсный вооля и вы на месте)Сюжет на высоте,очень порадовала русская локализация,графика да и всё очень нравиться в этой игре,мой вам совет не верьте роботу который на протяжение всей игры пытаеться вас в чём то убедить,та ещё крыса.

很有趣的游戏。主线剧情难度不大，稍稍思考下就可以通过的，和二代相比简直太简单。
剧情上面惊喜不多，多半都能猜到后面会发生什么。
通关后结尾的歌曲很喜欢～
附加的关卡，会让你怀疑自己的智商！不知道全打通的人怎么做到的。当你认为用8个传送门完成已经是极限的时候，他居然要求只用5个哈哈哈。

PS:上面虽然显示繁中有完全语音支持，但是和蛋糕一样，是个谎言啊，原以为会听到中文（啊这个一定是我想太多了）。

8/10

Amazing game! Its a must have, even though its not very long (4 hours for me) it has brain teasing puzzels, very funny dialog and has the best hand-held device OF ALL TIME!!!! Get it now!

10/10
I recomend this game to every one no matter what you normally play..... BEST GAME EVER

Portal is one of my favorite puzzle games to date. Portal's unique and innovative gameplay makes it a very enjoyable game. Many of Portal's levels are difficult (especially the bonus levels), but there is immense satisfaction after competing challenging levels.  Portal also includes a complex and mysterious story with ties to Valve's Half Life universe. Portal's atmosphere in-game does a great job at making the user feel as if they are alone and isolated from any human activity.  Portal's story and exceptional gameplay combine to make a remarkable video game. Portal does feature a remarkably short campaign, but it is made up redeeming qualities like the well written story and original game mechanics. Portal is a great video game that is definitely worth a purchase.
Una experiencia nunca antes experimentada.

Is this a good game? Yes. Unless your interested in the first Portal specifically, I would recommend getting the second one. I enjoyed this game and beat every level/challenge I could, but i thought it was rather short. Valve did a great job on this game and it definitely deserves the love that it gets.

Nemám co bych dodal,  nejlepší hra která se mi dostala do ruky. ikdyž je to starší kousek dokáže to běžet i na potato pc (netbook s 1Ghz Apu a 4 Gb ram)

Jop logická hra, To mě bavit nebude, Jeje jak jsem se mýlil. GLADOs nezklamala a pobavila, Prostory a lore hry je tajemnější jak hrad v karpatech a svým způsobem vám to i drásá nervy, Co se stalo s vědci? Jak jste se tam vzali vy? Co znamenal konec? Oh tam by se toho dalo vymyslet....

S odstupem bezmála 10 let pokládám tohle za naprostou kultovku a nutnost mít odehrané. Hra inspirovala mnohé jiné hry a i dnes je možné najít odkazy na tuto hru v moderních hrách (cyberpunk 2077)

Co opravdu zklame je neschopnost valve opravit českou lokalizaci. po instalaci je přítomna staré rozbitá verze která nezobrazuje korektně titulky (texty jsou vynechané) je potřeba hru znovu přehrnout opravenou češtinou... myslím si že jedna by měla být na uloz.to.... případně se zkuste poptat u mě.

Bought this game and waited a few days to play it. In the 4.4 hours I played it, I beat the main game and a few advanced maps. My favorite characters are the turrets; get one to shoot another one. I also believe everyone should have a portal gun.
Игра уникальна. Такого я еще не видел. Заставляет долго думать и иногда просто бомбит от ее хардкорности. Жаль что она короткая,часов на 7-10 было бы классно такую. Графика неплохая. Итог 8/10.

Frist of all, this game is awesome. If you like single player games, BUY THIS IMMEDIATELY!
I myself played the full story tree times and still have fun

+Characters have a very developed personality
+Voicework is the best
+Dialogs are very funny, with smart jokes and full of irony
+The gameplay is innovative 
+The puzzles difficulty are medium, but if you have never played portal, you will probably find it hard
+Plus you have the bonus Challenger Maps, which (obviously) are challenging

+- Some say the graphics are poor, I think they are more than enough to support the awesome gameplay that portal have and I'm happy with it

-Relatively small single player (mine were about 6 to 8 hours). But having a short lenght doesn't mean that the game isn't worth
